sentences.en: ...the deflection of light as it passes through the slits in the grating.
sentences.cn: ... 光线穿过栅栏缝隙的折射。

sentences.en: Adjust the INDUCTOR control for lowest deflection on the reflected power.
sentences.cn: 把INDUCTOR调整到和反射功率有最小的偏差.

sentences.en: Compatibility will require that the girder deflection at B be zero.
sentences.cn: 根据协调性的要求,梁在B点的挠度应为零.

sentences.en: Deflection moved to Tier 3. 3 point talent now.
sentences.cn: 偏斜移动到第3层,只有3个等级.

sentences.en: Each interaction produces an energy loss and deflection.
sentences.cn: 每次相互作用都引起粒子能量损失和方向偏转.

sentences.en: Excessive deflection in a structure may cause considerable damage to cladding.
sentences.cn: 结构的过大挠度可以引起覆盖面的巨大破坏.

sentences.en: In the analysis of plates in bending, deflection is obtained by solving Eq.
sentences.cn: 在受弯板的分析中, 借求解满足板边界处条件的方程得出挠度.

sentences.en: It lays the foundation for the arc deflection control of DC EAF.
sentences.cn: 该方法的应用为直流电弧炉偏弧控制打下坚实的基础.

sentences.en: Positive aileron deflection produces an anti - clockwise moment about the X axis.
sentences.cn: 正的副翼偏转角产生绕X轴的负方向力矩.

sentences.en: Some parameters , such as the deflection power index are provided.
sentences.cn: 给出了实际研制的125°偏转线圈的偏转功率指数.

sentences.en: the deflection of the missile away from its target
The gage deflection is due to the momentum transfer.
sentences.cn: 压力计的偏转是由于动量交换的原因.

sentences.en: The range is usually limited to the full - scale deflection of the indicator.
sentences.cn: 量程通常以指针的全分度偏转为限.

sentences.en: The smallest deflection of the missile could bring disaster.
sentences.cn: 导弹有极微小的偏斜也可能酿出大祸.

sentences.en: These springs supply a reacting force proportional to the deflection.
sentences.cn: 这些仪表提供了与偏差成正比的恢复力.

sentences.en: This azimuth motion is known as the ballistic deflection error.
sentences.cn: 这种绕方位轴的运动称为冲击偏差.

trans.tran_cn: 偏斜，偏移，歪曲，偏斜度，偏角
trans.tran_en: a sudden change in the direction that sth is moving in, usually after it has hit sth; the act of causing sth to change direction
